summary: Makes most helms  invisible, allowing you to wear helms without hiding your face.
descriptionHtml:
Makes most helms invisible, allowing you to wear headgear without hiding your face.

Ever wanted to show off your good looks? Or maybe your ugly mug, but need the protection that a helm offers? Well now you can have your cake and eat it too!, this Mod makes most helms (but not enchanted helms, or hoods/hats) invisible.
author: z999z3mystorys
